config.subject: daily unjumble: updates from Chainlink, beeple, #CryptoNews and more!
config.introText: Hey you! Make sure you're customising your preferences at the bottom of this email - track your favourite web3 communities and interests in one spot! Now go enjoy this Friday :)

items.content: Grayscale Investments revealed that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) considers the Filecoin token $FIL might be a security.

Coinbase's announcement of its intention to contest the SEC's potential enforcement action could force court rulings that define how the cryptocurrency industry can move forward, as the SEC's move could foreshadow an effort to break the back of the crypto sector as it now operates, according to CoinDesk's Jesse Hamilton.

ARK Invest, Cathie Wood's hedge fund, bought $17.7 million worth of Coinbase (COIN) shares amid a slump due to a pending SEC action, after selling 160,887 shares for $13.5 million when the stock was $83 per share.

Coinbase's announcement of its intention to contest the SEC's potential enforcement action could force court rulings that define how the cryptocurrency industry can move forward, as the SEC's move could foreshadow an effort to break the back of the crypto sector as it now operates, according to CoinDesk's Jesse Hamilton.
Grayscale Investments revealed that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) considers the Filecoin token $FIL might be a security.

Coinbase's announcement of its intention to contest the SEC's potential enforcement action could force court rulings that define how the cryptocurrency industry can move forward, as the SEC's move could foreshadow an effort to break the back of the crypto sector as it now operates, according to CoinDesk's Jesse Hamilton.
Grayscale Investments revealed that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) considers the Filecoin token $FIL might be a security.
OpenSea announces the exclusive public drop of Grumbies NFT, adorable creatures that add to your collection, happening within an hour.
@VanFalk_ believes strongly that Disney's pathway to the blockchain is not through Disney+ but through the theme parks, according to Overpriced JPEGs on Twitter, with a link to a related podcast.
NFTstatistics.eth presents some charts on holders who have accumulated huge positions on Blur, potentially for farming purposes.
